resources.string: Check your email for the verification code and enter it below.
Thank you for agreeing to participate in 30 Days. Please grant access to device data and usage below.
We know that privacy is a big deal, so your personal information will be protected using advanced encryption and anonymized.
The following types of data will be collected in order to better understand social media usage and online privacy:
• Which apps are installed\n• Time spent using the device\n• Time spent using each app

Tell us about an interaction you had with someone online today

You earn $1.50 for each journal entry submitted.

Additionally, the study is broken up into 6 periods of 5 days each, and if you submit a journal entry for each of the 5 days within a period, you will receive a $10 bonus.

For example, if you submit the first 5 journal entries in a row, you will receive a $10 bonus after the 5th entry. Or, if you submit the 6th through the 10th journal entries, you will receive a $10 bonus after the 10th entry.

Since there are 6 of these periods, you can earn up to $60 in bonuses. This means you can earn up to $105 from submitting journal entries.
